head.supplied: 1/8/87. ¶ Gentlemen. ¶ ¶ Best thanks for sending me the two copies of the new part of your R. S. proceedings, ¶ which as usual is replet with novel records and original observations. It was with reg...

div.p: To the Royal Society of New South Wales
ML MSS 9077, Box 65, Royal Society of NSW papers, Mitchell Library, State Library of NSW, Sydney

Best thanks for sending me the two copies of the new part of your R. S. proceedings,
Journal and Proceedings of the Royal Society of New South Wales. which as usual is replet with novel records and original observations. It was with regret, that I saw myself deprived through other urgent engagements to contribute to these pages. As however the msc. for the “Key to the system of Vict. plants”
B88.11.02. will likely be completed in August now, and be through the press by October, I have every prospect of being able, to work on new plants in the last portion of this year, and will not fail then, to offer some article also to the R. S. of NSW. I am sorry, that I cannot attend at the Adelaide-Exhibition,
Jubilee International Exhibition, Adelaide, 1887. nor at the medical Congress,
Intercolonial Medical Congress, Adelaide, August-September 1887. for the latter of which I was to have written by special desire a therapeutic essay; but it is not safe for me with my pulmonary sufferings to travel at the cool season, and it is very doubtful, whether even in the warmth of summer I could take out of my time late in life the week , needful to visit Adelaide.
